### Budget Breakdown
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)
library(here)
# Read data from budget.xlsx
budget <- read_excel(here("budget.xlsx"))

# Display the table using kableExtra with styling
budget %>%
  knitr::kable(format = 'html')
```
